languages.text: "Нет. Я не верю. Я — ваш слуга, и клятва, которую я принес вашей династии, тверже стали. Я каюсь в том, что повторил недостойную ложь, и выплачу штраф. И всякого, кто повторит ее при мне, я сам вызову на дуэль до смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Нет. Я не верю. Я — ваш слуга, и клятва, которую я принес вашей династии, тверже стали. Я каюсь в том, что повторил недостойную ложь, и выплачу штраф. И всякого, кто повторит ее при мне, я сам вызову на дуэль до смерти".

languages.text: "No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Я не верю. Я — ваш слуга, и клятва, которую я принес вашей династии, тверже стали. Я каюсь в том, что повторил недостойную ложь, и выплачу штраф. И всякого, кто повторит ее при мне, я сам вызову на дуэль до смерти".

"No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

"No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

"No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

"No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

languages.text: 「いえ。彼の言葉を信じてはおりません。私は陛下の従臣であり、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝への誓いは鋼より固い。唾棄すべき嘘を繰り返した罪、この償いはいたします。そして私の前で嘘を繰り返す者があれば誰であろうと、私自ら命がけの決闘に挑みましょう」
languages.original_text: "No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

traits.locale_text: 「いえ。彼の言葉を信じてはおりません。私は陛下の従臣であり、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝への誓いは鋼より固い。唾棄すべき嘘を繰り返した罪、この償いはいたします。そして私の前で嘘を繰り返す者があれば誰であろうと、私自ら命がけの決闘に挑みましょう」

languages.text: “不，我并不相信这些胡言乱语。我是您的仆人，我对王朝的誓言比钢铁还要坚硬。我重复了这些可耻的谎言，我犯下了罪过，我愿意为此支付罚金。如果有谁胆敢在我面前重复这些谎言，我会与那些人决一死战。”
languages.original_text: "No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

traits.locale_text: “不，我并不相信这些胡言乱语。我是您的仆人，我对王朝的誓言比钢铁还要坚硬。我重复了这些可耻的谎言，我犯下了罪过，我愿意为此支付罚金。如果有谁胆敢在我面前重复这些谎言，我会与那些人决一死战。”

languages.text: «No, no creo en sus palabras. Le sirvo a usted y mi juramento para con su dinastía es más fuerte que el acero. Soy culpable de repetir una mentira vergonzosa y por ello pagaré una sanción. Y me batiré en un duelo a muerte con cualquiera que haga lo mismo conmigo presente».
languages.original_text: "No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

traits.locale_text: «No, no creo en sus palabras. Le sirvo a usted y mi juramento para con su dinastía es más fuerte que el acero. Soy culpable de repetir una mentira vergonzosa y por ello pagaré una sanción. Y me batiré en un duelo a muerte con cualquiera que haga lo mismo conmigo presente».

languages.text: « Non, je ne crois pas un mot de ces ragots. Je suis votre serviteur, et le serment qui me lie à votre dynastie est plus solide que l'acier. Je me suis rendu coupable d'avoir colporté un mensonge abject ; j'en paierai le prix et je défierai moi-même en duel à mort quiconque aura l'audace de le répéter en ma présence. »
languages.original_text: "No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

traits.locale_text: « Non, je ne crois pas un mot de ces ragots. Je suis votre serviteur, et le serment qui me lie à votre dynastie est plus solide que l'acier. Je me suis rendu coupable d'avoir colporté un mensonge abject ; j'en paierai le prix et je défierai moi-même en duel à mort quiconque aura l'audace de le répéter en ma présence. »

languages.text: "Nein. Ich glaube seine Worte nicht. Ich bin Euer Diener, und mein Eid für Eure Dynastie wiegt schwerer als Stahl. Ich habe mich schuldig gemacht, eine schändliche Lüge zu wiederholen, und werde eine Strafe entrichten. Und wer sie in meiner Anwesenheit erneut äußert, den werde ich selbst zu einem Duell bis zum Tode herausfordern."
languages.original_text: "No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Ich glaube seine Worte nicht. Ich bin Euer Diener, und mein Eid für Eure Dynastie wiegt schwerer als Stahl. Ich habe mich schuldig gemacht, eine schändliche Lüge zu wiederholen, und werde eine Strafe entrichten. Und wer sie in meiner Anwesenheit erneut äußert, den werde ich selbst zu einem Duell bis zum Tode herausfordern."

languages.text: "Haşa. Ben kim, Kunrad'ın yalanlarına inanmak kim! Ben sizin hizmetkârınızım. Hanedanlığınız uğruna ettiğim yeminden dönmem. Madem aşağılık bir yalanı tekrarlama suçunu işledim, cezası neyse öderim. Huzurumda bu yalanı ağzına sakız edeni duyarsam da ölümüne düelloya davet edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "No. I do not believe his words. I am your servant, and my oath to your dynasty is harder than steel. I am guilty of repeating an ignominious lie, and I will pay a fine. And anyone who repeats it in my presence I myself will challenge to a duel to the death."

traits.locale_text: "Haşa, ben kim, onun yalanlarına inanmak kim! Ben sizin hizmetkârınızım. Hanedanlığınız uğruna ettiğim yeminden dönmem. Madem aşağılık bir yalanı tekrarlama suçunu işledim, cezası neyse öderim. Huzurumda bu yalanı ağzına sakız edeni duyarsam da ölümüne düelloya davet edeceğim."
